document.full_text: japan pumped nitrogen gas into a crippled nuclear reactor on thursday, trying to prevent an explosive buildup of hydrogen gas as the world's worst nuclear disaster in 25 years stirred atomic safety debate and inspections in the united states.
document.title: japan focuses on hydrogen buildup after nuclear leak
lines_and_colors: japan pumped nitrogen gas into a crippled nuclear reactor on thursday, trying to prevent an explosive buildup of hydrogen gas as the world's worst nuclear disaster in 25 years stirred atomic safety debate and inspections in the united states.
